page.title: 19BRYN-TRAFFIC SURVEY.
page.content: THE TRAFFIC GOING THROUGH THE VILLAGE WAS STUDIED ON TWO DIFFERENT DAYS;ON 22/10/84 AND ON 11/3/85. {1.22/10/84-}BETWEEN-11.00a.m.-12.00. TO PORT TALBOT- TO MAESTEG- {CARS} {=}35 {CARS =}25 {LORRIES =}02 {LORRIES =}04 { VANS =}03 {VANS =}05 { MOTORBIKES =}02 {MOTORBIKES = { {2.11/3/85- }BETWEEN-1.20p.m.-2.20p.m. TO PORT TALBOT- TO MAESTEG- {CARS =}85 {CARS =}95 {LORRIES =}04 {LORRIES =}13 {VANS =}11 {VANS =}18 { BUS =}02 {BUS =}02 { LIBRARY =}01 {LIBRARY =}00 { MOTORBIKES =}01 {MOTORBIKES =}01 { CRANE =}01 {CRANE =}01 {AMBULANCE =}01 {AMBULANCE =}00
